mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(A.MEMBER_BIRTHDAY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS MEMBER_BIRTHDAY , SF_GET_CODE_NAME('AF',A.MEMBER_GENDER) AS MEMBER_GENDER , A.MEMBER_GENDER AS MEMBER_GENDER_CODE , B.VILLAGE_NAME , B.VILLAGE_SEQ , A.PHONE_NUMBER , A.MEMBER_POSITION , A.MEMBER_JOB , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_ADDRESS , A.FIRST_ATTENDANCE , DATE_FORMAT(A.FAITH_START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FAITH_START_DATE , A.BAPTISM_CODE , A.ATTENDANCE_CHURCH , A.OFFICIATOR , A.ATTENDANCE_REASON , A.LEADER , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_TS,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGIST_TS , A.UPDATE_TS FROM MEMBER A, VILLAGE B WHERE A.VILLAGE_SEQ = B.VILLAGE_SEQ AND B.VILLAGE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}

SELECT FAMILY_SEQ , MEMBER_SEQ , SF_GET_CODE_NAME('AC',FAMILY_CODE) AS FAMILY_CODE_NAME , FAMILY_CODE , FAMILY_NAME , SF_GET_CODE_NAME('AD',RELIGON_CODE) AS RELIGON_CODE , REMARK FROM FAMILY_RELATIONS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY FAMILY_CODE
